Name: Child's Spinning Toy
Description: The example of a spinning toy is very much the same as children's toys of modern times. The Ancient Egyptians made delightful toys from wood, bone, ivory, ceramics, and stone. Little children played with dolls, toy animals, spinning toys, and mechanical toys such as crocodiles with moving jaws and Jumping Jacks, human figures whose arms and legs would move in bouncing motions.
